participant_1.background:
I have many favorite childhood memories, but one that stands out is the time I went swimming in the lake with my family
i am an anime fan.
i often think about quitting my job and becoming a roadie for justin bieber.
I'm looking forward to having more free time now that my siblings are older.
i work as a receptionist at a lawyers office.

participant_2.background:
I am in good health and I take care of myself.
I spend my day learning about personal finance and investing while watching Star Wars.
I cherish my cello.
my parents are in there 80 s.
i drive a mercedes.

content.text: Good! Just watching Star Wars and eating some ice cream. How about you?
Not bad! I am actually watching some anime.
Oh cool! What anime are you watching?
It is a bit of a weird one called "The Promised Neverland". It's about a bunch of kids who have to survive in a mysterious world.
That sounds interesting! I might have to check it out.
It is really good so far! I am on episode 4.
Nice! I am on episode 6 of my show. It is called "The Mandalorian". It is about a bounty hunter in the Star Wars universe.
Oh cool! I have heard good things about that show. I might have to check it out.
You should! It is really good!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
